name: Ruzty Duck Shooter
description:
Move that mouse quickly and don't lose hold of that left button. Play as Ruzty the Kitty Kat and hunt down the mega-flock of ducks in this vertical, arcade shooter.

Kill 3 unique enemies: Blues are innocent- just shoot them, Reds would shoot at you! Greens though stronger, would take the nearby ducks down with them!

Game Modes:

Killing Spree: Shoot down as many ducks as you can and move up the leader board.

15 Seconds O'Fame: Think you're tough enough? The intensity has increased, can you survive for 15 seconds?

current version: beta 1.0

future additions towards final release: working leader boards and power ups.
